extension.description:
Ads Elite Plugin

Require Ads Starter Plugin to work.



- Access Plugin : Extensions >> Plugin Manager >> Ads Elite
- Copy your AdSense code to Basic Parameters
- Publish/Enable
- Save.

( Need Help ? Report a bug ? Request a new feature ? : Click Here - Contact Us )
